mapper.insert: insert into RESERVATION (reservation_num, customer_id, room_number, accom_name, company_id, start_date, end_date, peple_num) values (#{reservationNum}, #{customerId}, #{roomNumber}, #{accomName}, #{companyId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{pepleNum})
mapper.update: update RESERVATION set customer_id = #{customerId}, room_number = #{roomNumber}, accom_name = #{accomName}, company_id = #{companyId}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, peple_num = #{pepleNum} where reservation_num = #{reservationNum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESERVATION WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId} ORDER BY RESERVATION_NUM DESC
SELECT * FROM RESERVATION WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId} AND sysdate < START_DATE ORDER BY RESERVATION_NUM DESC
SELECT * FROM RESERVATION WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId} AND sysdate BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE ORDER BY RESERVATION_NUM DESC
